analysis.name: murderparty
analysis.description: A 3D game project developed within the Godot Engine, likely centered around a murder mystery theme.
achievements: Developed a 3D game project employing GDScript and the Godot Engine, showcasing experience in game development fundamentals.
Implemented game assets, including 3D models, textures, and shaders, demonstrating proficiency in creating visually engaging game environments.
Structured the project with organized directories for assets, scripts, and scenes, indicating strong organizational skills in game development workflow.
key_features: Utilizes 3D modeling for game environments and characters.
Employs GDScript for game logic implementation and interaction.
Leverages Godot Engine's scene system to structure game elements, potentially including characters, and environmental items.
